TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: The Dree were not exaggerating, this area is quite hot. I will be quite relieved when we set up the portable life support.
AZOLLA: I will as well, I fear we would not survive long in this heat otherwise.
OKALIS: Hm, I don’t seem to be able to fire my portside thrusters, which is making maneuvering difficult.
NESIA: I seem to have lost vertical thrust. I believe the excessive heat may be interfering with our propulsion systems. I would advise we retreat for the moment.
OKALIS: …I actually seem to have lost all thrust, I may require assistance to return.
AZOLLA: Unfortunately, that seems to be the case for all of us. It seems that we are trapped here, for the time being.
SENNETTI: The temperature here is entirely inhospitable, if we are unable to find a way to propel ourselves soon, we aren't going to make it out!
NESIA: Is the heat affecting my vision, or is there movement coming from the entrance?
OKALIS: There is! It seems the Dree have noticed our plight, and have come to retrieve us!
DITYLUM: Hey, we noticed that you stopped moving, I thought you were going to go to the surface to set up life support?
AZOLLA: We were, but it appears our propulsion systems failed due to the heat.
DITYLUM: We told you it was a bad idea to come far in here, weird signal or not. Come on, let’s get you out of here.
AZOLLA: Thank you. Once you get us out of here, we should be entirely able to modify our propulsion systems to handle the heat, making our return trip much more successful.
DITYLUM: Hah! And here I thought you couldn’t tell a joke without the science of it going over my head.
DITYLUM: By the <color=purple>Bramble</color>, you’re serious aren’t you…
